text: wa-idh taqulu lilladhi anʿama l-lahu ʿalayhi wa-anʿamta ʿalayhi amsik ʿalayka zawjaka wa-ittaqi l-laha watukh'fi fi nafsika ma l-lahu mub'dihi watakhsha l-nasa wal-lahu ahaqqu an takhshahu falamma qada zaydun min'ha wataran zawwajnakaha likay la yakuna ʿala l-mu'minina harajun fi azwaji adʿiyaihim idha qadaw min'hunna wataran wakana amru l-lahi mafʿulan
